metadata.title: CVE-2024-38595 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:net/mlx5: Fix peer devlink set for SF representor devlink portThe cited patch change register devlink flow, and neglect to reflectthe changes for peer devlink set logic.
